categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Unidentified Human male Jedi 2  (Capture of Darth Revan)
This male Human individual was a member of the Jedi Order during the Jedi Civil War. He wielded a green-bladed lightsaber in combat.

During the Jedi Civil War this Jedi was a member of the strike team sent to capture Darth Revan, alongside Bastila Shan and five others. The Jedi successfully boarded Revan's flagship and fought their way to the bridge to confront the Dark Lord. He and three of his comrades were killed when Revan's opportunistic apprentice Malak ordered his gunners to fire upon the bridge, seeking to rid himself of both his master and the Jedi.
